alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Ottawa; Republic; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 07 at 7:50PM CDT until April 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 009, 020, 021, AND 034... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 009, 020, 021, AND 034... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 008, 009, 020, 021, and 034. * WIND...South winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts of 25 to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...Relative humidity falling into the 15 to 20 percent range during the afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning should not occur as fires could quickly become out of control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
